Posts.Content: It might be a lipoma. An ultrasound wouldn't be able to tell if it is cancer or not, but it might be able to tell you the likeliness of being cancer. A biopsy would have to be done to rule it out. I have lots of lipomas and they feel movable.
Posts.Title: why not biopsy?

Posts.Content: I get severe left armpit/breast pain and I had a mammogram and they did an U/S of the underarm and breast. The U/S found 2 enlarged lymph nodes, but they have since gone down and I am still having the pain. The Dr thinks it is breast tissue pushing into the underarm area (whatever!!!) Basically they cannot figure out why I am having this pain. It is pretty unbearable at times. It has been going on since Oct 2009. I am 35.
Posts.Title: Severe breast pain...any help appreciated

Posts.Content: Did you get an answer on what this was? I have been having left sided chest pain and found a bony lump too. I was dx'd with costochondritis.
Posts.Title: bone like lump upper right chest with pain
